name: 王泰典
objective: 介紹工程力學的基本概念，針對靜力學領域各項基本假設、定義與理論與詳加說明，引導求解的程序，以養成學習者解決工程靜力問題的基本能力。
schedule:
W01: Introduction
W02~03: Statics of particles
W04~05: Rigid bodies: Equivalent systems of forces, Quit #1
W06~07: Equilibrium of rigid bodies
W08~09: Distributed forces: centroids and centers of gravity, Quit #2
W10~11: Analysis of structures
W12: Forces in beams and cables
W13~14: Friction, Quit #3
W15~16: Distributed forces: moments of inertia
W17~18: Method of vitural work, Final
materials: Beer, F.P., E. R. Johnston, Jr. and E. R. Eisenberg, Vector mechanics for engineers, Eighth edition, Mc Graw Hill. 滄海書局代理
